page.title: 17WORCESTERSHIRE TRANSPORT
page.content:
A{private car}is really necessary in this rural area.
Public bus services operate along the A449 between{Worcester}and {Kidderminster}in the west and in the east from{Droitwich}to{Cutnall Green and{Elmley Lovett.}The western (Midland Red) service is hourly, but the eastern services operated by private companies are very limited, being confined mainly to services taking children to and from schools in Droitwich.
The{Droitwich}to{Kidderminster}railway line crosses the area. There is an hourly service during the week and every two hours from lunch time on Sundays - but none of the trains stop.....
